name: NSBezierPath.LineJoinStyle
desc: Constants that specify the shape of the joins between connected segments of a stroked path.

items.name: case miter
items.desc: Specifies a miter line shape of the joints between connected segments of a stroked path.

items.name: case round
items.desc: Specifies a round line shape of the joints between connected segments of a stroked path.

items.name: case bevel
items.desc: Specifies a bevel line shape of the joints between connected segments of a stroked path.
